headline: CarMax (KMX): Rethinking Valuation After Lawsuits, CEO Exit, and Slump in Used Car Sales
summary: CarMax (KMX) has found itself at the center of investor scrutiny after a wave of shareholder lawsuits alleged the company misled the market about its growth outlook. These legal moves come just as the company reported drops in retail used unit sales and earnings, in addition to the CEO’s sudden departure. See our latest analysis for CarMax. While CarMax has been rolling out customer-friendly innovations like at-home pickup and expanding its nationwide footprint with a new Arkansas store, none...
